headline: Kettle Corn
name: Kettle Corn
description: This kettle corn recipe is made on the stovetop with just three ingredients and tastes deliciously old-fashioned and straight from the county fair.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat. Stir in popcorn kernels and sugar.
Cover and shake the pot constantly to prevent sugar from burning. When popping has slowed to once every 2 to 3 seconds, remove the pot from the heat and shake for a few minutes until popping stops.
Pour popcorn into a large bowl and allow to cool, stirring occasionally to break up large clumps.
